entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Jasper

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
